Package in.co.rays.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ORSView
    Contains ORS View and Controller URI
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseCtl
    Base controller class of project.
    ChangePasswordCtl
    Controller to handle Change Password functionality.
    CollegeCtl
    CollegeCtl Servlet Controller class to perform Add, Update, Delete and Get operations for College.
    CollegeListCtl
    CollegeListCtl servlet class to handle operations like searching, listing, deleting, and paginating College records.
    CourseCtl
    CourseCtl Servlet Controller.
    CourseListCtl
    Course List functionality Controller.
    ErrorCtl
    ErrorCtl servlet class to handle application errors.
    FacultyCtl
    FacultyCtl controller to handle Faculty data operations.
    FacultyListCtl
    FacultyListCtl servlet controller to handle listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of Faculty records.
    ForgetPasswordCtl
    ForgetPasswordCtl handles the "Forgot Password" functionality.
    FrontController
    FrontController filter acts as a security layer to intercept all incoming requests to protected resources (under `/doc/*` and `/ctl/*` URL patterns).
    GetMarksheetCtl
    Controller to Get Marksheet by Roll Number functionality.
    LoginCtl
    Controller to handle Login and Logout functionality.
    MarksheetCtl
    Controller to handle operations related to Marksheet.
    MarksheetListCtl
    Controller to handle Marksheet List operations.
    MarksheetMeritListCtl
    Controller to display the Marksheet Merit List.
    MyProfileCtl
    Controller to handle My Profile functionality of a user.
    RoleCtl
    RoleCtl handles operations for adding and updating Role entities.
    RoleListCtl
    RoleListCtl handles the listing, searching, pagination, and deletion of Role records.
    StudentCtl
    Controller to handle Student add/update operations.
    StudentListCtl
    Student List Controller.
    SubjectCtl
    Subject Controller.
    SubjectListCtl
    Subject List Controller.
    TimetableCtl
    Timetable Controller to handle timetable add, update, and preload data.
    TimetableListCtl
    Timetable List Controller to handle listing, searching, pagination, and deleting of timetable records.
    UserCtl
    User Controller to handle adding, updating, validation and displaying User form.
    UserListCtl
    User List Controller to handle list, search, delete operations of User.
    UserRegistrationCtl
    UserRegistrationCtl is a servlet controller class to handle user registration.
    WelcomeCtl
    WelcomeCtl is a servlet controller class that forwards requests to the Welcome view.
